individual_metadata.synopsis: This goblin is standing guard inside temple - he's a little more relaxed than his zealous companion. Offers 'beginners' advice to player. As hostile as any other goblin if you try to pass without his superior's permission.

0.speaker: Warrior Nrog
0.text: Priestess burned ya, then? Thought I smelled somethin' tasty cookin'.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Sniffs player before delivering line.NodeContext: Sniffs at player again before delivering line. Tone is mocking but friendly.

1.speaker: Warrior Nrog
1.text: Oi! We ain't said you pass - you don't pass.
1.context: NodeContext: 'Oi' is shouted. You've tried to pass without permission, and he threatens you to go back. Should be intimidating as ignoring this leads to combat.

2.speaker: Warrior Nrog
2.text: Been boozin'? Won't make the brandin' go any easier - I tried.
2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Goblin sniffs player's breath before delivering line.NodeContext: Goblin sniffs player's breath before delivering line - laconic, offering advice.

3.speaker: Warrior Nrog
3.text: Go on. Sooner yer marked, sooner ye'll heal.
3.context: NodeContext: Bored. Giving advice to one less wise than he.
